name: Evan
description:
First 3d third person survival shooter game released by us . Survive in a beautiful cartoon world full of geometry shaped zombie when the dusk come at that place Features: Beautiful created cartoon residential place 3 type of geometry simple zombie Use AK47 to kill them all Colourful world environment Thanks for any support you give to me . More game will developed soon
